document_data.name: Amber Vikdotter
document_data.mainbody:
'''Amber Vikdotter''' was a mage and notorious fraudster who posed as a ferocious and tyrannical ruler of the [[Realm of Fire]] in the [[Utter East]] during the time of the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]).

Upon learning of her ruse, the leader of the [[Legendary Campaign]] (which sought to unify the wartorn Utter East through conquest) determined to expose her, and so assaulted her realm in a [[bloodforge]] battle.
